rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the TEST in TRTEST. TRTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: "TUMSTATE", "DIAMETER", "LESSCIND", "LESRVIND". See TR Assumption 3.
datasetVariables.label: Tumor/Lesion Assessment Short Name
datasetVariables.name: TRTESTCD

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRTEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the test or examination used to obtain the measurement or finding. The value in TRTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: "Tumor State", "Diameter", "Volume", "Lesion Success Indicator", "Lesion Revascularization Indicator". See TR Assumption 3.
datasetVariables.label: Tumor/Lesion Assessment Test Name
datasetVariables.name: TRTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from TRORRES in a standard format or standard units. TRSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in TRSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Character Result/Finding in Std Format
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from TRSTRESC. TRSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for TRSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: TRSTRESU

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate a scan/image/physical exam was not performed or a tumor/lesion measurement was not taken. Should be null if a result exists in TRORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: TRSTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why a scan/image/physical exam was not performed or a tumor/lesion measurement was not taken. Examples: "SCAN NOT PERFORMED", "NOT ASSESSABLE: IMAGE OBSCURED TUMOR". Used in conjunction with TRSTAT when value is "NOT DONE".
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: TRREASND

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRNAM

datasetVariables.description: The name or identifier of the vendor that performed the tumor/lesion measurement or assessment. This column can be left null when the investigator provides the complete set of data in the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Laboratory/Vendor Name
datasetVariables.name: TRNAM

datasetVariables.label: Method Used to Identify the Tumor/Lesion
datasetVariables.name: TRMETHOD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRLOBXFL

datasetVariables.description: Operationally-derived indicator used to identify the last non-missing value prior to RFXSTDTC. Should be "Y" or null.
datasetVariables.label: Last Observation Before Exposure Flag
datasetVariables.name: TRLOBXFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRBLFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify a baseline value. Should be "Y" or null. Note that TRBLFL is retained for backward compatibility. The authoritative baseline flag for statistical analysis is in an ADaM dataset.
datasetVariables.label: Baseline Flag
datasetVariables.name: TRBLFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78735

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TREVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Used only for results that are subjective (e.g., assigned by a person or a group). Examples: "ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE", "INDEPENDENT ASSESSOR".
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: TREVAL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96777

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TREVALID

datasetVariables.description: Used to distinguish multiple evaluators with the same role recorded in TREVAL. Examples:" RADIOLOGIST1", "RADIOLOGIST2". See TR Assumption 6.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator Identifier
datasetVariables.name: TREVALID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRACPTFL

datasetVariables.description: In cases where more than one independent assessor (e.g., "RADIOLOGIST 1", "RADIOLOGIST 2", "ADJUDICATION COMMITTEE") provide independent assessments at the same time point, this flag identifies the record that is considered to be the accepted assessment.
datasetVariables.label: Accepted Record Flag
datasetVariables.name: TRACPTFL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRDTC

datasetVariables.description: The date of the scan/image/physical exam. TRDTC does not represent the date that the image was read to identify tumors/lesions. TRDTC also does not represent the VISIT date.

datasetVariables.name: TRDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TR.TRDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the scan/image/physical exam, measured as integer days. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Tumor/Lesion Measurement
datasetVariables.name: TRDY

description: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors or lesions identified in the tumor/lesion identification (TU) domain. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C106578, 2018-06-29)
label: Tumor/Lesion Results
name: TR
